UX Improvements for IBM Co-op/Intern Project Management

Current Issues

1. Redundant Navigation

  • Problem: “Ambitions & Projects” tab duplicates project browsing functionality
  • Impact: Confusing navigation, unclear purpose of each tab
  • Solution: Merge into single “Projects” view with role-based filtering

2. Co-op Project Visibility

  • Problem: Co-ops can see all available projects (too much choice)
  • Impact: Doesn’t create competitive environment, overwhelming for interns
  • Solution: Invitation-based system where co-ops only see:
    • Projects they’re invited to
    • Projects matching their career path interests
    • Limited “featured” opportunities

3. Tab Naming Clarity

  • Problem: Generic names don’t reflect IBM co-op program context
  • Impact: Users unsure what each section does
  • Solution: Rename tabs to be more descriptive and role-specific

Proposed Navigation Structure

For Managers/Leaders

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Dashboard | Projects | Talent Pool | Requests            │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Tab Descriptions: 1. Dashboard (current “Leadership”) - Organizational metrics and KPIs - Team performance overview - Compliance tracking

  1. Projects (merge “Ambitions & Projects” + “Projects”)
    • All projects with career path tags
    • Create/edit projects
    • Assign career paths to projects
    • View interest pipeline
  2. Talent Pool (current “Your Projects” - repurposed)
    • Browse all co-ops/interns
    • Filter by skills, career interests, availability
    • Match candidates to roles
    • Resume library
    • Invite candidates to projects
  3. Requests (keep as-is)
    • Pending join requests
    • Approve/reject applications

For Co-ops/Interns

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ My Projects | Opportunities | Profile                   │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Tab Descriptions: 1. My Projects (current “Your Projects”) - Active project assignments - Project details and team - Hours tracking - Learning progress

  1. Opportunities (replaces “Ambitions & Projects” + “Projects”)
    • My Invitations (top priority)
      • Projects you’ve been invited to
      • Accept/decline invitations
    • Career Paths (interest expression)
      • Browse career paths
      • Express interest (not direct project access)
      • See which projects align with interests
    • Featured Projects (limited, curated list)
      • 3-5 high-priority projects seeking talent
      • Must apply through manager approval
  2. Profile (new consolidated view)
    • Personal information
    • Skills and experience
    • Completed learning
    • Resume upload
    • Career interests

For Contributors (Regular Employees)

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ My Projects | Browse Projects | Profile                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Detailed Changes

Change 1: Merge “Ambitions & Projects” into “Projects”

Current State: - Separate “Ambitions & Projects” tab - Separate “Projects” tab - Confusing overlap

New State: - Single “Projects” tab for managers - Shows all projects with career path tags - Career paths are metadata on projects, not separate entities

Implementation:

// For Managers: Projects tab shows all projects with career path filters
<Tab label="Projects">
  <ProjectsView 
    showCareerPathFilter={true}
    showCreateProject={true}
    showAllProjects={true}
  />
</Tab>

// Career paths become filters/tags, not a separate view

Change 2: Restrict Co-op Project Visibility

Current State: - Co-ops can browse all projects - Can apply to any project

New State: - Co-ops see only: 1. Invitations (highest priority) 2. Career path interests (expression of interest, not direct access) 3. Featured opportunities (3-5 curated projects)

Implementation:

// For Co-ops/Interns: Opportunities tab
<Tab label="Opportunities">
  <OpportunitiesView>
    {/* Section 1: Invitations (highest priority) */}
    <InvitationsSection 
      title="Your Invitations"
      description="Projects you've been invited to join"
    />
    
    {/* Section 2: Career Interests */}
    <CareerPathsSection 
      title="Career Paths"
      description="Express interest in career paths to receive relevant invitations"
      mode="interest-only" // Can't see specific projects
    />
    
    {/* Section 3: Featured Projects (limited) */}
    <FeaturedProjectsSection 
      title="Featured Opportunities"
      description="High-priority projects seeking talent"
      maxProjects={5}
      requiresApproval={true}
    />
  </OpportunitiesView>
</Tab>

Change 3: Rename Tabs for Clarity

Manager/Leader Navigation: | Old Name | New Name | Rationale | |———-|———-|———–| | Leadership | Dashboard | More intuitive, standard term | | Ambitions & Projects | Removed | Merged into Projects | | Projects | Projects | Keep, but enhanced | | Your Projects | Talent Pool | Better describes manager view of team | | Requests | Requests | Keep as-is |

Co-op/Intern Navigation: | Old Name | New Name | Rationale | |———-|———-|———–| | Ambitions & Projects | Removed | Merged into Opportunities | | Projects | Removed | Merged into Opportunities | | Your Projects | My Projects | Clearer ownership | | New | Opportunities | New consolidated view | | New | Profile | Consolidated personal info |

Implementation Priority

Phase 1: Navigation Restructure (High Priority)

  1. ✅ Rename “Leadership” → “Dashboard”
  2. ✅ Merge “Ambitions & Projects” into “Projects” for managers
  3. ✅ Create “Opportunities” tab for co-ops (consolidate Ambitions & Projects)
  4. ✅ Rename “Your Projects” → “My Projects” for co-ops
  5. ✅ Rename “Your Projects” → “Talent Pool” for managers

Phase 2: Co-op Visibility Restrictions (High Priority)

  1. ✅ Implement invitation-first model
  2. ✅ Hide full project list from co-ops
  3. ✅ Show only invited projects
  4. ✅ Add “Featured Projects” section (max 5)
  5. ✅ Career paths become interest expression only

Phase 3: Enhanced Features (Medium Priority)

  1. Add project competition metrics
  2. Add “Why you’re a good fit” suggestions
  3. Add notification system for new invitations
  4. Add project recommendation engine

User Flows

Co-op Project Discovery Flow

1. Co-op logs in
   ↓
2. Sees "Opportunities" tab
   ↓
3. Top section: "Your Invitations" (if any)
   - Clear call-to-action: "You've been invited to 2 projects!"
   - Accept/Decline buttons
   ↓
4. Middle section: "Career Paths"
   - Browse career paths
   - Click "I'm Interested" to express interest
   - See message: "Managers will be notified of your interest"
   ↓
5. Bottom section: "Featured Opportunities"
   - 3-5 curated high-priority projects
   - "Request to Join" button (requires manager approval)
   - Shows fit score if available

Manager Talent Sourcing Flow

1. Manager creates project
   ↓
2. Assigns career paths to project
   ↓
3. Goes to "Talent Pool" tab
   ↓
4. Sees co-ops who expressed interest in matching career paths
   ↓
5. Reviews profiles and fit scores
   ↓
6. Clicks "Invite to Project"
   ↓
7. Co-op receives invitation in "Opportunities" tab

Benefits

For Co-ops/Interns

  • ✅ Less overwhelming (invitation-based)
  • ✅ Clear path to opportunities
  • ✅ Competitive environment encourages skill development
  • ✅ Personalized experience based on interests

For Managers/Leaders

  • ✅ Better talent matching
  • ✅ Proactive sourcing from interested candidates
  • ✅ Reduced noise from unqualified applications
  • ✅ Clear metrics on talent pipeline

For IBM

  • ✅ Better co-op experience
  • ✅ Higher quality project matches
  • ✅ Improved retention and satisfaction
  • ✅ Data-driven talent management

Mockup Changes

Manager Navigation (Before → After)

BEFORE:
[Leadership] [Ambitions & Projects] [Projects] [Your Projects] [Requests]

AFTER:
[Dashboard] [Projects] [Talent Pool] [Requests]

Co-op Navigation (Before → After)

BEFORE:
[Ambitions & Projects] [Projects] [Your Projects] [Requests]

AFTER:
[My Projects] [Opportunities] [Profile]

Implementation Files

Files to Modify

  1. src/layout/AppHeader.tsx - Update navigation tabs
  2. src/pages/AmbitionsPage.tsx - Merge into Projects or Opportunities
  3. src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx - Enhanced for managers
  4. src/pages/YourProjectsPage.tsx - Rename to MyProjects/TalentPool
  5. src/components/carbon/AmbitionsTab.tsx - Refactor into OpportunitiesTab
  6. src/components/carbon/ProjectsTab.tsx - Add career path integration

New Files to Create

  1. src/pages/OpportunitiesPage.tsx - New co-op opportunities view
  2. src/pages/TalentPoolPage.tsx - New manager talent view
  3. src/components/carbon/OpportunitiesTab.tsx - Consolidated co-op view
  4. src/components/carbon/FeaturedProjectsSection.tsx - Curated projects

Testing Checklist

Rollout Plan

  1. Week 1: Implement navigation changes
  2. Week 2: Implement co-op visibility restrictions
  3. Week 3: User testing with sample co-ops and managers
  4. Week 4: Refinements based on feedback
  5. Week 5: Production deployment

Success Metrics

  • Co-op satisfaction score > 4.5/5
  • Manager time-to-fill reduced by 30%
  • Application quality score improved
  • Reduced support tickets about navigation
  • Increased project acceptance rate
